amendment.description: An amendment No. 74 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funding from being used to enter into contracts for the procurement of energy or fuel for military installations if such energy or fuel originates from the Russian Federation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 74 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit funding from being used to enter into contracts for the procurement of energy or fuel for military installations if such energy or fuel originates from the Russian Federation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Barletta.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Barletta amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
